Description:
We are looking for experienced and highly motivated Storekeeper/Storeman for our facilities in UAE and Saudi Arabia.The incumbent should have relevant experience in the Construction/Engineering Industry.Responsibilities:Be responsible for the warehouse
Receive and inspect incoming goods, equipment and spares
Perform housekeeping of tools, equipment and spares
Perform receiving, checking, counting and storing of goods, equipment and spares in assigned locations/bins
Perform tasks such as picking and packing, loading and unloading of goods
Issue goods, equipment and spares and maintain proper records
Assist in annual stock taking
Maintain inventory system for audit purposes
Perform other warehouse duties as assignedSkills
Skills:
Min 2-3 years experience as Storekeeper/Storeman in Construction/Engineering industries
Knowledge of inventory management systems
Good computer skills
Capable of working independently with minimal supervision
UAE / Saudi Drivers license would be an added advantage although not mandatory
